header: Their vision - getting server-scale performance from handheld devices
brief: Machine learning innovation reduces computer power usage

header: Computational model helps with diabetes drug design
brief: Researchers can use the model to predict how engineered forms of insulin would perform in human patients, making it easier to bring these drugs to clinical trials

header: How to keep people out of the emergency room
brief: Help for immigrants in arranging primary care visits leads to substantial drop in ER visits and costs, a new study shows

header: This driverless car company is using chatbots to make its vehicles smarter
brief: Large language models are the next big thing for robotics, making cars and other robots quicker to train and easier to control (if you trust them)

header: Fast-Track Strain Engineering for Speedy Biomanufacturing
brief: The time and money required to engineer microbes to produce vital medicines and chemicals can be dramatically reduced with a new model-based method

header: Smart Utility Meter Security Takes a Quantum Leap
brief: Honeywell will secure its meters with cryptographic keys from Quantinuum
